description: Try our easy to follow Pumpkin & Feta Cheese Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Avocado,Easter,Peanut free
name: Pumpkin & Feta Cheese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Scrape the pumpkin seeds out of the pumpkin (leave for later) then cut into 3cm chunks and place in a large roasting tray. Drizzle with a lug of oil and season well. Sprinkle over the oregano, crumble over the dried chilli, and toss everything together well. Roast in the hot oven for 40-45 minutes, until golden and cooked through.

Meanwhile, halve and destone the avocados, then cut into chunks. Place in a large bowl with the lemon juice and the same amount of extra virgin olive oil. Finely slice the spring onions and add to the bowl, then season well.

Toast the pumpkin and cumin seeds in a hot, dry pan until golden. Leave to one side. When the pumpkin is ready, leave to cool for 5 minutes, then add to the bowl with the avocado. Tip in the toasted seeds, sprouts and mint leaves and toss well. Spread out on a serving platter and crumble over the feta cheese. Delicious!
